name: Deep Abyss
description:
Deep Abyss is composed of independent chapters, connected as one structure.
- It has a unique Control that seems unfamiliar yet simple to get used to.
- Explore the deep sea and space yourself as a diver. Swim through strange yet beautiful backgrounds and music. It will give you a new gaming experience that you have not felt in other games.
- The story progresses in the form of poetry rather than a linear composition. It is a game resembling a small painting where you can achieve poetic and artistic sensibility.
- Travel through bizarre landscapes to experience a new, remarkable game you have not yet played. Then, discover what whale you have inside your heart.

Notes
- It is recommended to fans of Journey, Abzu, Inside, and Little Nightmares.
- Experience the creative and artistic game created by a two-person development team.
- You can enjoy magnificent music from a professional sound design team.
- It is an adventure game with a mild journey of 2-hour playtime.
- The game can be enjoyed by anyone regardless of their spoken language.
